author: _shemnon
content: The eip mega spec can probably ship as-is today.  https://github.com/ipsilon/eof/blob/main/spec/eof.md - there's always more calls for one more op or one more way to eek out another compiler request (such as JUMPF) but as written Ipsolon's evmone has it implemented, along with the current spec of EVMMAX.

author: _shemnon
content: Next steps are reference tests and for besu, nethermind, ethereumjs, and geth to update their old big-eof versions (circa shanghai) to the mega-eof version.  I don't think Reth/revm had the shanghai version implemented.

author: _shemnon
content: There is also a request for variable length encodings, but I think it's too late to make the cut.

author: praveen0311
content: Hi quick quesion, Am runing a  execution client, Do we have specific endpoint to get the the execution rewards directly?
